definitions.body: ledge surrounding Ezekiel's altar; ´[[הָע]] [[הַתַּחְתּוֹנׇה]] = [[הַקְטַנׇּה]] ´[[הָע]] Ez Eze 43:14, below [[הַגְּדוֹלָה]] ´[[הָע]] v:Eze 43:14; ´[[הָע]] alone v:Eze 43:17, v:Eze 43:20, Eze 45:19 (v. Comm.).
